query_text:
I am a college student majoring in Environmental Science. I am working on a paper on the effects of human activities involving fossil fuels on the daily lives of ordinary people.
I want you to write a paper for me about the impacts of extracting and using fossil fuels (oil, coal, gas) on aspects of day-to-day life.  These impacts might, for example, be felt through the air that they breathe, the weather they experience, the food that they eat, or the prices that they pay for things (and that is not a complete list).  I am interested in both beneficial and harmful impacts. I am also interested in ways in which the harmful effects of fossil fuel extraction and use could be reduced through conservation, although for this report I am not interested in information about how other sources of energy such as renewables or nuclear power could substitute for fossil fuels.

items.question_text: What effect does air pollution have on life expectancy?
How much has the air pollution shortened the lives of people around the world?
How many premature deaths does the air pollution cause each year?
Which South Asian country is among the most polluted?
Which South Asian country is among the most polluted?
Which South Asian country is among the most polluted?
Which South Asian country is among the most polluted?
In which country has air pollution reduced average life expectancy in some areas by almost a decade?
In which country has air pollution reduced average life expectancy in some areas by almost a decade?
What share of infant deaths registered in 2019 was caused by pollution?
What are the negative effects of harmful substances in the air for newborns?
How can harmful substances in the air negatively impact fetal development?
What kind of imbalances are people living near places where hydraulic fracturing is practiced to extract gas and oil at risk for?
What causes hormonal imbalances in people living near places where hydraulic fracturing is practiced to extract gas and oil?
What can hormonal imbalances result in?
In what way can oil and gas enterprises cause damage to agricultural land?
gold_answers: They can destroy the fertile soil layer

items.question_text: What measures can businesses take to reduce air pollution and improve people’s quality of life?
gold_answers: Bring the facilities up to date with the legal norms

items.question_text: What measures can governments take to reduce air pollution and improve people’s quality of life?
gold_answers: Gradually reduce the number of coal-burning power plants

items.question_text: What measures can governments take to reduce air pollution and improve people’s quality of life?
What measures can governments take to reduce air pollution and improve people’s quality of life?
gold_answers: Increase fines on companies polluting the environment

query_text:
I am a YouTuber creating content on music history and styles.
I am gathering material for a video on David Bowie’s androgynous image, and how it has influenced various spheres and eras. I need a report about Bowie’s influence on other musical artists, primarily in their affect, appearance or presentation, and especially if they mention his androgyny or chameleon aesthetic. The report should include material on the transformative effect of specific Bowie albums on rock music and pop culture.

items.question_text: What is the reason David Bowie is called “a chameleon of rock music”?
What was David Bowie’s alter ego called?
What was David Bowie’s alter ego called?
What characteristic allowed David Bowie to easily switch between characters?
Which musician copied David Bowie’s brand?
Which musician copied David Bowie’s brand?
Which musician copied David Bowie’s brand?
What music group did David Bowie’s album Hunky Dory influence?
What music group did David Bowie’s album Hunky Dory influence?
What artist did David Bowie’s album Hunky Dory influence?
What Soviet countercultural artists’ collective were inspired by David Bowie?
How did Mitki use David Bowie’s persona in their art?
gold_answers: As an antagonist to their own simple folk style

items.question_text: In what way did David Bowie influence the style of progressive youth of the second half of the twentieth century?
gold_answers: Through creating hundreds of visual images

items.question_text: How did David Bowie influence the the late twentieth century fashion?
gold_answers: By popularizing a marketable androgynous brand

items.question_text: What product inspired by David Bowie did the company Mattel release?
What was the David Bowie inspired Barbie doll released by the company Mattel called?
What David Bowie style features did the “Ziggy Stardust” Barbie doll released by the company Mattel have?
What animal was named after David Bowie?
Why was a mollusk named after David Bowie?
gold_answers: Because it changes color from transparent to gray

query_text:
I work for the US Department of Commerce, and I am gathering information on the investment scene in Kyrgyzstan to support future American investments in the country’s economy. Kyrgyzstan’s debt to China is a concern, so I am now preparing an analysis on that topic.
In this report I need information on Chinese investments in Kyrgyzstan. Specifically, I need information on the types of projects in which Chinese entities are investing, the amounts of money invested, and information on public and private debt in Kyrgyzstan that is owed to China arising from previous investments.

items.question_text: What project were the business agreements signed at the 2019 Kyrgyz-Chinese business forum about?
gold_answers: A free trade cooperation industrial park

What is the percentage of Chinese investments in the total volume of direct investments in Kyrgyzstan?
What made most Chinese projects in Kyrgyzstan unsuccessful?
gold_answers: lack of information provided to Kyrgyzstani population
Kyrgyzstani government’s lack of strategic vision

query_text:
I am on the board of Tourism for Mongolia and am looking to expand tourism to Mongolia. I'm looking for ways to advertise how Mongolia would be worth visiting for people interested in paleontology and other prehistoric studies.
I plan to write an article about dinosaur fossils unearthed in Mongolia. My article will feature fossilized dinosaur eggs, bones, and fossil evidence of feathers. My article will highlight places where Mongolian fossils can be visited by the general public.

query_text:
I work for a tech company that may be involved in future expeditions to Mars. Our task is to determine whether it is possible to create a sustainable atmosphere for Mars expeditions. 
I am writing a report on how to create a sustainable atmosphere on Mars. My report should include the equipment needed to create the atmosphere, worst case scenarios we should plan for, and the largest number of people that could be sustained by the atmosphere. I am also interested in NASA’s oxygen-generating experiment on Mars. I plan to report on the experiment plan, the experiment itself, and the results of it. I will highlight the incorporation of local materials, if any, in the creation of the sustainable atmosphere.

items.question_text: What are the results of the most recent NASA experiments on creating oxygen on Mars?
What is the name of the equipment that NASA built to create oxygen?
gold_answers: The Mars Oxygen In-situ Resource Utilization Experiment (MOXIE)

items.question_text: What was the cost of NASA's attempt to create oxygen?
When is NASA (or other space agencies) planning to send people to Mars?
How does MOXIE create oxygen?
How much oxygen does MOXIE create on average?
What will oxygen on Mars be used for?
How much fuel is needed to launch a rocket with 4 astronauts from Mars to Earth?
How much oxygen is needed to launch a rocket with 4 astronauts from Mars to Earth?
How is the MOXIE equipment protected?
gold_answers: Coated with a thin layer of gold

items.question_text: How does a thin layer of gold protect MOXIE?
How does a thin layer of gold protect MOXIE?
How many more tests will MOXIE undergo?
What pitfalls have been identified when creating oxygen from CO2 on Mars?
How can carbon monoxide from creating oxygen from CO2 be contained?
What substance on Mars can be used to create oxygen?
What electrocatalyst creates oxygen from elements found on Mars?
How much more energy efficient is using lead-ruthenium oxide than MOXIE?
What are the advantages of using lead-ruthenium oxide?
What substance on Mars could be used to create oxygen?

query_text:
I am a consultant with a fashion design company and am looking for products that our company can use to produce clothing. We are looking for sustainable natural fibers that are not very costly, yet provide an income for their producers. Mongolian cashmere is one that has drawn our attention, and I am writing a report to assess its viability for our clothing line.
I am interested in the Mongolian cashmere fiber industry. I am seeking economic statistics about the industry, including: how much cashmere fiber is produced domestically; how much is exported; the countries that import cashmere fiber from Mongolia (and in what quantity); how much income is generated; and, the outlook for growth.

items.question_text: What is the cashmere goat herd count in Mongolia?
What is the annual cashmere production in Mongolia?
Together with China, how much cashmere does Mongolia produce in a year?
Has the cost of cashmere increased or decreased?
Why has the cost of cashmere decreased?
How much was the profit of exported finished cashmere products in 2018?
How much has the profit increased in 2018 from 2008?
Who is competing to purchase cashmere from Mongolia?
Name one high end couture company purchasing cashmere.
What has Mongolia done to increase its connectivity to the world market?
gold_answers: Became a Northeast Asia trade partner

items.question_text: What has Mongolia done to increase its cashmere market?
Through what exchange did Mongolia launch its online sales platform?
What is the environmental impact of raising cashmere goats?
How much of the Mongolian Steppe has been degraded?
What companies are reducing or ceasing their purchase of new cashmere?
Why have certain companies decided against new cashmere?
What has Gucci done in order to continue using cashmere?
What problems has Mongolia encountered in their cashmere production?

query_text:
I am a self-proclaimed airplane nerd that writes a blog, and am fascinated by this newest endeavor by Stratolaunch. I need a report so that I can write about it accurately in my blog.
I need to find out as much as I can about the world’s biggest airplane made by Stratolaunch Systems. I want to know about its physical description, performance data, and how the aircraft might be used. The aircraft's first flight should be described.

gold_answers: 6 25-ton thrust Pratt & Whitney PW4056 bypass turbojet engines
